title: 07/12/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/12/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys return for vacation to recap the NBA Finals until this point and as well as preview MLB All Star festivities. ESPN's Michael Wilbon explains what went wrong with Devin Booker last night. Harold Reynolds of the MLB Network talks tonight's Home Run Derby. And Reggie checks in to discuss why he wouldn't trade AD for Dame Lillard if he were the Lakers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
